skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in front-end development, where I focus on crafting engaging user interfaces and seamless user experiences. Leveraging technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I ensure that websites and applications are not only visually appealing but also functional and intuitive to navigate.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: My expertise in back-end development revolves around building robust and scalable server-side solutions to power dynamic web applications. With proficiency in languages like Node.js and frameworks like Express.js, I design and implement efficient APIs, manage databases, and handle server-side logic, ensuring smooth functionality and data management.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: In UI/UX design, I combine creativity with user-centric principles to design visually stunning and highly usable interfaces. Through thorough research, wireframing, and prototyping, I strive to understand user needs and behaviors, crafting interfaces that are not only aesthetically pleasing but also intuitive and accessible, enhancing the overall user experience.

skills.title: Responsive Design
skills.description: My focus on responsive design ensures that websites I develop adapt seamlessly to various screen sizes and devices, providing users with an optimal viewing experience. Using a combination of fluid grids, flexible images, and media queries, I create layouts that adjust dynamically, maintaining usability and accessibility across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
